Initialize.label: Data - Optional
Initialize.description: Path to the data (CSV format) to be loaded for processing.

Initialize.label: Timestamp Column Name - Optional
Initialize.description: Name of the column header that contains the time series timestamps.

Slice.label: Start Time
Slice.description: Python datetime object used as the slice start date of the data.

Slice.label: End Time
Slice.description: Python datetime object used as the slice end date of the data.

Slice.label: Inplace - Optional
Slice.description: Modify the dataset directly. Defaults to False.

Add Parameter.label: Inplace - Optional
Add Parameter.description: Modify the dataset directly. Defaults to False.

Apply Function.label: Variable Names
Apply Function.description: List of variables used as input to the function. All elements in variable_names need to be in self.data.columns

Apply Function.label: New Variable Name
Apply Function.description: Name of the new variable containing the result of the function for each time stamp.

Apply Function.label: Function to Apply
Apply Function.description: Name of the function to apply. Choices are: `sum`, `min`, `max`or `average` (or 'mean').

Apply Function.label: Inplace - Optional
Apply Function.description: Modify the dataset directly. Defaults to False.

Concatenate.label: Datasets
Concatenate.description: List of datasets (pd.DataFrame) to concatenate with `data`.

Concatenate.label: Axis
Concatenate.description: 1 or 0. 1 performs a vertical concatenation and 0 performs a horizontal concatenation.

Concatenate.label: Inplace - Optional
Concatenate.description: Modify the dataset directly. Defaults to False.

Fill Missing Values.label: Method
Fill Missing Values.description: Method to use to fill the missing values: 'linear' (treat values as equally spaced) or 'pad' (use existing values).

Fill Missing Values.label: Variable Names - Optional
Fill Missing Values.description: List of variable names that need missing values to be filled. By default, fill all missing data in self.data

Fill Missing Values.label: Inplace - Optional
Fill Missing Values.description: Modify the dataset directly. Defaults to False.

Plot.label: Variable Names
Plot.description: List of variables to plot. The variables must be in the data.

Plot.label: Kind
Plot.description: Type of chart to plot, either'timeseries', or 'scatter'.

Downsample.label: Number Of Periods
Downsample.description: Number of frequency used for downsampling. For instance, use 1 and a frequency_type of 'hour' to downsample the data to every hour.

Downsample.label: Sampling Function - Optional
Downsample.description: Function to apply during downsampling, either 'mean' or 'sum' or a dictionary of key value pairs where the keys correspond to all the variables in data and value are either 'mean' or sum'. By default, using mean to downsample.

Downsample.label: Inplace - Optional
Downsample.description: Modify the dataset directly. Defaults to False.

Report Multiple Cases.label: Item Names
Report Multiple Cases.description: List of unique verification item names. If the `item_names` argument is empty, all the verification results in the `verification_json` argument are reported.

Initialize.label: Cases - Optional
Initialize.description: A list of Dict. dictionary that includes verification case(s).

Initialize.label: JSON Case Path - Optional
Initialize.description: Path to the verification case file. If the path ends with `*.json`, then the items in the JSON file are loaded. If the path points to a directory, then verification cases JSON files are loaded.

Load Verification Cases from JSON.label: JSON Case Path
Load Verification Cases from JSON.description: path to the json file containing fully defined verification cases.

Save Case Suite to JSON.label: JSON Path
Save Case Suite to JSON.description: Path to the json file to save the cases.

Save Case Suite to JSON.label: Case IDs - Optional
Save Case Suite to JSON.description: Unique ids of verification cases to save. By default, save all cases in `self.case_suite`. Default to an empty list.

Create Verification Case Suite from Base.label: Update Key Value
Create Verification Case Suite from Base.description: the same format as the `base_case` arg, but the updating fields consist of a list of values to be populated with.

Create Verification Case Suite from Base.label: Keep Base Case - Optional
Create Verification Case Suite from Base.description: whether to keep the base case in returned list of verification cases. Default to False.

Validate Verification Case Structure.label: Case
Validate Verification Case Structure.description: case information that will be validated.

Validate Verification Case Structure.label: Verbose
Validate Verification Case Structure.description: whether to output verbose information. Default to False.

Save Verification Cases to JSON.label: JSON Path
Save Verification Cases to JSON.description: json file path to save the cases.

Save Verification Cases to JSON.label: Cases
Save Verification Cases to JSON.description: List of complete verification cases Dictionary to save.

Initialize.label: Lib Path - Optional
Initialize.description: path to the verification library file or folder. If the path ends with `*.json`, then library items defined in the json file are loaded. If the path points to a directory, then library items in all jsons in this directory and its subdirectories are loaded. Library item need to have unique name defined in the json files and python files. Defaults to None.

Validate Library.label: Items
Validate Library.description: Library items to validate. `items` must be filled with valid verification item(s). If not, an error occurs. Defaults to empty list.

Get Library Items.label: Items
Get Library Items.description: Library items to get. By default, get all library items loaded at instantiation. Defaults to empty list.

Get Required Datapoints by Library Items.label: Items
Get Required Datapoints by Library Items.description: Library items to summarize datapoints from. By default, summarize all library items loaded at instantiation. Defaults to empty list.

Configure.label: Lib Items Path
Configure.description: Verification library path (include name of the file with extension).

Configure.label: Plot Option - Optional
Configure.description: Type of plots to include. It should either be all-compact, all-expand, day-compact, or day-expand. It can also be None, which will plot all types. Default to None.

Configure.label: Fig Size - Optional
Configure.description: Tuple of integers (length, height) describing the size of the figure to plot. Defaults to (6.4, 4.8).

Configure.label: Num Threads - Optional
Configure.description: Number of threads to run verifications in parallel. Defaults to 1.

Configure.label: Preprocessed Data - Optional
Configure.description: Pre-processed data stored in the data frame. Default to None.
